cause.description:
This cause is about providing support for all the girls who have lost their mother out there. Weither you are young or old, you still know the pain of the loss and the more support the better.
not only motherless daughters can join this cause though. If you have a friend who is in this position, or a family member. join. show support. show that you care.
1. Losing a mother is a painful expirience
2. Everyone deserves support and love
3. Anyone can support those who grieve
cause.mission: Give support to all those out there who have lost their mother
cause.name: Motherless Daughters Support
